statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 100
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100;
SELECT product_name, sales_date, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, MAX(revenue) AS max_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC, revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE SaleAmount > 1000
SELECT SaleDate, SaleAmount FROM SalesData ORDER BY SaleDate DESC
SELECT ProductName, ProductCategory FROM ProductInventory
SELECT ProductName, InStockQuantity FROM ProductInventory WHERE InStockQuantity < 50
SELECT SaleID, ProductID, SaleDate, SaleAmount FROM SalesData ORDER BY SaleAmount ASC
SELECT SaleID, ProductID, SaleDate, SaleAmount FROM SalesData
SELECT ProductName, ProductCategory, InStockQuantity FROM ProductInventory
SELECT SaleID, SaleAmount, SaleDate, ProductID FROM SalesData
SELECT ProductCategory, ProductName, InStockQuantity FROM ProductInventory
SELECT SaleID, ProductID, SaleAmount, SaleDate FROM SalesData
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_amount >= 500 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE last_restock_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, forecast_amount FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, supplier_id FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, quantity_in_stock, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 1001;
SELECT product_id, quantity_in_stock, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock ASC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_id, predicted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT avg(price) AS avg_price, max(price) AS max_price, min(price) AS min_price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, available_quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, quantity, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity_sold, s.total_price FROM products p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products p INNER JOIN categories c ON p.category = c.category_name GROUP BY category_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
